name: Cutieheart
description:
PLEASE NOTE:This game is a work in progress! It is unfinished.What I have uploaded is currently the first 10 minutes or so of the game.ABOUT

I've always loved J-RPGs and RPG-Maker horror games, so I finally decided to make my own! Cutieheart is the first game I've ever made as a personal project, and I hope you enjoy it as much as I had fun making it.

There are 3 different possible endings for this game.

STORY

You play as a young girl named Sabie (me, lol.) and follow her adventures as she gets transported from her daily high school life to a magical realm! Even though her dream of being a Magical Girl has finally come true, something still seems off...
